about_the_game:
Calorie Mate has created a game!
Transform into a can of Calorie Mate LIQUID
and deliver nutrition to a game creator immersed in work.
This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.

About the Game
You control a Calorie Mate LIQUID can that has jumped out of the fridge
and move, turn, and jump to reach the goal.
To complete the game, your can must reach the hand of the game creator in the workroom.
The Liquid’s temperature will rise with time and other factors.
Try to get it to the goal at as chilled a temperature as possible.
While navigating the apartment room, various obstacles will block Liquid and threaten its power gauge.
When the gauge hits zero, the game is over.

Video Streaming Guidelines
・Streaming is permitted without prior approval.
・Monetization of content using images from this game is permitted only when using the functions provided by the video streaming website.
・We assume no responsibility for damages of any kind incurred through streaming of video from this game.
(This game is available for a limited time until March 11, 2025.)

Message
In game development, countless obstacles arise.
Yet, when you don’t give up and wish to amaze the world,
that passion, and nutrition, become the driving force for immersion.

CONTINUE TO CREATE

CalorieMate LIQUID
FOR GAME CREATORS

Calorie Mate
Calorie Mate is a nutritionally balanced food.
Containing five major nutrients (protein, fat, sugars, vitamins, and minerals), Calorie Mate provides balanced dietary support.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Transform into a can of Calorie Mate LIQUID that jumps out of the fridge and deliver nutrition to a game creator hard at work. This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.
